Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: GETDATE()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: GETDATE()

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [Id], [Name] FROM dbo.Genres END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spGenres_All] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.MovieRatings WHERE MovieId = @MovieId) BEGIN SELECT AVG(Rate) AS AverageRate FROM dbo.MovieRatings WHERE MovieId = @MovieId END ELSE BEGIN SELECT 0 AS AverageRate END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT [Id], [MovieId], [UserId], [Rate], [RatingDate] FROM dbo.MovieRatings WHERE UserId = @UserId AND MovieId = @MovieId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [Id], [Title], [Summary], [InTheaters], [Trailer], [ReleaseDate], [Poster] FROM dbo.Movies END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spMovies_All] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT a.[Id], a.[RoleId], a.[Email], a.[Password], a.[Name], a.[Biography], a.[Picture], a.[DateOfBirth], b.[Character] FROM dbo.People a JOIN dbo.MovieActors b ON b.PersonId = a.Id WHERE b.MovieId = @Id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT [Id], [Title], [Summary], [InTheaters], [Trailer], [ReleaseDate], [Poster] FROM dbo.Movies WHERE Id = @Id
SELECT [Id], [MovieId], [GenreId] FROM dbo.MovieGenres WHERE MovieId = @Id
SELECT [Id], [PersonId], [MovieId], [Character], [Order] FROM dbo.MovieActors WHERE MovieId = @Id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT b.Id, b.[Name] FROM dbo.MovieGenres a JOIN dbo.Genres b ON a.GenreId = b.Id WHERE a.MovieId = @Id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT TOP (@Limit) [Id], [Title], [Summary], [InTheaters], [Trailer], [ReleaseDate], [Poster] FROM dbo.Movies WHERE InTheaters > 0 ORDER BY ReleaseDate DESC END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT TOP (@Limit) [Id], [Title], [Summary], [InTheaters], [Trailer], [ReleaseDate], [Poster] FROM dbo.Movies WHERE ReleaseDate > GETDATE() ORDER BY ReleaseDate END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE dbo.[Movies] SET Title = @Title, Summary = @Summary, InTheaters = @InTheaters, Trailer = @Trailer, ReleaseDate = @ReleaseDate, Poster = @Poster WHERE Id = @Id; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [Id], [Name] FROM dbo.Roles END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spRoles_All] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [Id], [RoleId], [Email], [Password], [Name], [Biography], [Picture], [DateOfBirth] FROM dbo.People END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spUsers_All] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT p.[Id], p.[RoleId], p.[Email], p.[Password], p.[Name], p.[Biography], p.[Picture], p.[DateOfBirth], r.[Name] AS RoleName FROM dbo.[People] p JOIN dbo.[Roles] r ON p.RoleId = r.Id WHERE p.Email = @Email AND p.[Password] = @Password END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT TOP (@Limit) [Id], [RoleId], [Email], [Password], [Name], [Biography], [Picture], [DateOfBirth] FROM dbo.People WHERE [Name] LIKE '%'+@SearchText+'%' ORDER BY [Name] END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE dbo.[People] SET RoleId = @RoleId, Email = @Email, [Password] = @Password, [Name] = @Name, Biography = @Biography, Picture = @Picture, DateOfBirth = @DateOfBirth WHERE Id = @Id; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
